Equipment Actions.Action 1: Pincer, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 10ft, Average Damage: 16 Bludgeoning, Can Grapple Medium or smaller creatures
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Fist, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 7 Bludgeoning

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Glabrezu makes 4 attacks, two with its Pincers and two with its Fists.  Alternatively, it makes two attacks with its Pincers and casts one spell

Abilities.Ability 1: Innate Spellcasting, The Glabrezu can innately cast a few spells
Abilities.Ability 2: Magic Resistance, The Glabrezu has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects

Damage Resistances.Damage 4: Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from nonmagical attacks
